verbs.description: The Supreme Court [V: seemed] [ARG1: poised] [ARGM-TMP: Wednesday] [C-ARG1: to uphold President Donald Trump 's ban on travel to the U.S. by visitors from several Muslim - majority countries] , a move that would hand the president a major victory on a controversial signature policy .
